A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Some truly epic moments here.  The best interactions are between Rey and Kylo.

But.... much like The Force Awkens\, Rian Johnson pulls a bait and switch with Luke Skywalker.  He relegates him to a coward on an Island\, who's eventual entrance into the fray is smoke and mirrors.

I was stunned and very disappointed with the treatment of the Character and waste of such good options.

Other than that for the most part it was very solid.
